name: Pearl Diving Heritage
description: This exhibit showcases the rich pearl diving tradition of the UAE, featuring historical diving equipment, pearls, and interactive displays on the life of pearl divers.

comments.comment: Fascinating history! I never knew how important pearl diving was.
The interactive elements were fun and educational.

name: Islamic Golden Age Innovations
description: Discover the scientific and technological innovations from the Islamic Golden Age, including astrolabes, surgical instruments, and architectural designs.

comments.comment: Mind-blowing to see these ancient innovations still influencing today's technology.

name: Desert Life Adaptation
description: Learn how plants, animals, and people have adapted to thrive in the harsh desert environment of the UAE throughout history.

name: Modern UAE Architecture
description: Explore the striking evolution of UAE architecture, from traditional wind towers to the futuristic skylines of today.

name: Calligraphy Through Centuries
description: A stunning collection of Islamic calligraphy works spanning over a thousand years, showing the evolution of this revered art form.
